Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Ohio
ShortDescription: Southbound 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via  Kedzie, Chicago, Homan, Franklin, and Kedzie due to, police activity near Kedzie/Ohio.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute at 35th/Michigan

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Update: #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 35th, State, 33rd, King Drive, and 35th due to, street blockage near 35th/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
